name: U Lock Holster - Black Vegan Bike Tube Rubber Holder
description:
Reusing. The wave of the future.

BSCs U-Lock Holster keeps your U-Lock secured to your waist, via your belt, easily accessible at all times. Just Pull it out & lock up, Unlock and slide it back in.

Each holster is equipped with a Heavy-Duty ring to clip your keys onto, keeping them all in one place. Sweet.

This holster is Vegan Friendly, hand made with hand tools and hardcore music using discarded bike tubes and heavy duty rivets and d-rings sourced from local shops.

Three sizes are available:
S – Minis 3.5"
M – Mediums 4.5"
L – Standard 5.5" U-locks

Feel free to write if you have any other questions.

Visit our blog and see our Etsy.com store for more items

https://blackshipcrafts.blogspot.com
https://blackshipcrafts.etsy.com

name: Tri-Fold Snap Wallet: Black Vegan Bike Tube Rubber
description:
Sleek Black Tri-Fold Snap Wallet

Reusing. The wave of the future.

Keep it in your pants. Or in your shorts, or jersey, pannier, wherever you want really. This tough wallet can handle any situation, tri-fold for max storage, dual snap to keep it together in battle, and a grommet in the corner to tie it to your dinghy.

This wallet is Vegan Friendly, hand made with hand tools and hardcore using discarded bike tubes and heavy duty rivets and d-rings sourced from local shops.

great match for BSC Utility Belt!
want a bi-fold? No snaps? anything custom, i’ll hook it up.

Feel free to write if you have any other questions.

Thanks for supporting handmade crafts!

Visit our blog and see our Etsy.com store for more items

https://blackshipcrafts.blogspot.com
https://blackshipcrafts.etsy.com

name: Utility Belt: Black Vegan Leather Bike Tube Rubber
description:
Black Utility Belt

Reusing. The wave of the future.

BSCs B.Y.O.B. belts keep your pants up, your keys on your side and your hands free to ride! Equipped with snaps for your own custom buckle. And there’s plenty of room for pouches (cellphone, multi-tool, etc) Flexi but tight, sturdy for years. True.

This belt is Vegan Friendly, hand made with hand tools and hardcore music using discarded bike tubes and heavy duty rivets and d-rings sourced from local shops.

great match for U-Lock Holster!

Lengths: avg is 32" (12" – 48" on req.)
key ring on R hip (L or Both on req.)
Widths: 1.25-1.75" (1" or 2" on request)

**PLEASE SPECIFY LENGTH** or you will get an avg (32")!!

Feel free to write if you have any other questions.

Visit our blog and see our Etsy.com store for more items

https://blackshipcrafts.etsy.com

name: Bondage Bracelet - Black Vegan Leather Bike Tube Rubber
description:
Reusing. The wave of the future.

 Each ringed bondage bracelet is made with Heavy-Duty rings: should last up to 200 goth shows, 100 metal shows, or 50 punk shows...

This bracelet is Vegan Friendly, handmade with hand tools and hardcore music using discarded bike tubes and heavy duty rivets, d-rings, and snaps sourced from local shops.

name: Tree Hoop Earrings: Black Bike Tube Vegan Leather Rubber
description:
Tree Hoop Earrings to adorn your bike loving ear lobes! These are a one of a kind custom made item.

-2 quality matching hanging tree hoop with brand new ear clasps hand made from discarded, cleaned, polished, bike tube and cleaned re-purposed bicycle chain.

note: this is a one of a kind item. Please allow 5-7 days for shipping. Thanks for your patience and support of DIY recycled crafts! -BSC
